item.title: CPM Urges CM to Visit Joorala Project Over Dam Repair Safety Concerns
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: John Wesley, the Telangana State Secretary of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), urged Chief Minister Revanth Reddy to visit the Joorala Project. He wants the Chief Minister to conduct a review meeting with officials to uncover the real issues concerning the crest gatesâ€™ safety.
On Friday, John Wesley visited the project and examined the damaged ropes of the crest gates. He talked with project officials to grasp the situation. Speaking to the media, he blamed local leaders and auth...]]>
